name: Robot King Part I: Rebooted and Ready
description: The first in a 3 part series, Robot King follows the journey of a robot on a quest to find his place in a kingdom where everyone seems bent on his destruction. Navigate through 4 unique areas, collecting gold as you go. Customize your robot with 40 possible equipments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 100 MB available space
